name: noor-al-maarifa-website
description: Noor Al Maarifa Trading L.L.C - Premium Stationery & Office Supplies Website

scripts.build:js: npx terser scripts/static-script.js --compress --mangle --output dist/scripts/static-script.min.js && npx terser scripts/script.js --compress --mangle --output dist/scripts/script.min.js && npx terser scripts/firebase-config.js --compress --mangle --output dist/scripts/firebase-config.min.js
scripts.build:html: npx html-minifier-terser index-optimized.html --output dist/index.html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --minify-css true --minify-js true
scripts.copy:assets: if not exist "dist\css" mkdir dist\css && if not exist "dist\scripts" mkdir dist\scripts && if not exist "dist\images" mkdir dist\images
scripts.update:paths: npx replace-in-file "css/styles.css" "css/styles.min.css" dist/index.html && npx replace-in-file "scripts/script.js" "scripts/script.min.js" dist/index.html && npx replace-in-file "scripts/firebase-config.js" "scripts/firebase-config.min.js" dist/index.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy:assets && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run copy:images && npm run build:html && npm run update:paths
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && npm run gzip

author: Noor Al Maarifa Trading L.L.C
